content:
I'll create a simple button for you with basic styling and setup.

My steps:
1. Set up Vite project structure
2. Create HTML with a button element
3. Add CSS styling for the button
4. Include footer with copyright bar
<bielaArtifact id="simple-button" title="Simple Button Project"><bielaAction type="file" filePath="package.json" mode="create"></bielaAction><bielaAction type="file" filePath="index.html" mode="create"></bielaAction><bielaAction type="file" filePath="style.css" mode="create"></bielaAction><bielaAction type="shell">npm install</bielaAction><bielaAction type="file" filePath="script.js" mode="create"><bielaAction type="start">npm run dev</bielaAction></bielaAction></bielaArtifact>
reasoning:
The user wants me to create a simple button. Since this appears to be the start of a new project and no files were found, I need to create a basic setup. I'll:

1. Set up a basic HTML/CSS/JS project using Vite 
2. Create a simple button with some basic styling
3. Since this is a website and no specific copyright content was requested, I need to include the copyright bar at the bottom as specified in the instructions

Let me plan:
1. Create package.json with Vite
2. Create index.html with a simple button
3. Add some CSS styling for the button
4. Include the copyright bar as specified in the footer
5. Start the dev server

I need to remember to wrap all text outside artifacts in <bielaText> tags and be concise.
